entryNode.title: Entry Node
entryNode.description: The first node in a journey, which limits it to a specific segment.

exitNode.title: Exit Node
exitNode.description: Defines when a user exits a journey. Allows users to re-enter the journey, under some set of conditions.

anyOf.title: Delay Node
anyOf.description: Delays a users progression through the journey for either a set amount of time, or until a specific date time.

anyOf.title: Rate Limit Node
anyOf.description: Used to limit the frequency with which users are contacted by a given Journey.

anyOf.title: Segment Split Node
anyOf.description: Used to split users among audiences, based on the behavior and attributes.

anyOf.title: Message Node
anyOf.description: Used to contact a user on a message channel.

anyOf.title: Experiment Split Node
anyOf.description: Used to split users among experiment paths, to test their effectiveness.

put.description: Create or update a user segment.
Submit a broadcast for a segment.
Create or update email provider settings
Create or update email provider settings
Create or update a user property.

parameters.name: df-workspace-id
parameters.description: Id of the workspace which will receive the segment payload. Defaults to the default workspace id, for single tenant systems

put.description: Allows users to manage their subscriptions.

hash.description: Subscription change hash, used to authenticate subscription changes.

post.description: Used to consume segment.io webhook payloads. Must be exposed publicly to the internet.

parameters.name: df-workspace-id
parameters.description: Id of the workspace which will receive the segment payload. Defaults to the default workspace id, for single tenant systems

get.description: Boom endpoint for throwing errors and testing telemetry.
